title: The Trump Organization
added: On September 2, 2021, a New York judge ordered the Trump Organization to submit a report to the New York attorney general's office describing exactly what the organization was doing to comply with the subpoenas for its documents.<ref>{{Cite web|last=Scannell|first=Kara|date=24 September 2021|title=Judge orders Trump Org. to address subpoenas by New York attorney general for company records|url=https://www.cnn.com/2021/09/24/politics/trump-organization-taxes-new-york/index.html|url-status=live|access-date=2021-09-24|website=CNN}}</ref>
